title: New antidepressant mechanism of Yueju Pill: Increasing ghrelin level by inhibiting gastric mTOR/S6K signaling pathway and sensitizing hippocampal GHS-R
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Zhentao Zhang, Dan Su, Meixizi Lai, Yonggui Song, Huizhen Li, Ming Yang, Genhua Zhu, Hong Liu, Zhifu Ai
